Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the object this DAO manages
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
Generic abstract DAO class that provides common database operations for any model type. Uses reflection to dynamically build queries and map result sets.

    • findById

      public T findById(int id)
      Finds an object in the database by its ID
      Parameters:
      id - the primary key of the object
      Returns:
      the object found, or null if not found

    • insert

      public int insert(T obj)
      Inserts a new object into the database. Automatically ignores the id field, wich is typically auto incremented
      Parameters:
      obj - the object inserted
      Returns:
      the generated ID of the inserted row

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entries from the table corresponding to type T
      Returns:
      a list of all objects from the database table

      public int update(T obj)
      Updates the object in the database Matches the object by its id field
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to update
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected
